channel.title: Rob Mac on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Rob Mac on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Necaxa’ Review: Eva Longoria’s FXX Mexican Soccer Docuseries Lives in the Shadow of ‘Welcome to Wrexham’
item.description: The Ryan Reynolds- and Rob Mac-produced project, which focuses on a struggling squad in Mexico, is one in a recent wave of series about celebrities investing in sports teams.

item.title: Variety Honors 10 Comics To Watch at Just For Laughs Festival
item.description: After a year away, the Just For Laughs Comedy Festival returned to Montreal with a star-studded line-up of the biggest names in laughter. On July 24, Variety presented their annual 10 Comics To Watch
